LanguageData.Build_Hawk_MM1.label: Build Hawk MM-1
LanguageData.Build_Hawk_MM1.description: Build the Hawk MM-1 Grenade Launcher, big size revolver launcher, 12 shots with long reload.\nCaliber: 40x46mm Grenade
LanguageData.Build_RGS.label: Build RGS
LanguageData.Build_RGS.description: Builds the RGS Grenade Launcher, 3 times the ammo consumption.\nCaliber: 30x29mm Grenade
LanguageData.Build_CG42R.label: Build Carl Gustav fm/42 Recoiless anti-tank Rifle
LanguageData.Build_CG42R.description: Builds the Carl Gustav fm/42 Recoiless anti-tank Rifle, not as effective as a rocket launcher, but can still easily penetrate any armor.\nCaliber: 20mm shell
LanguageData.Build_CG42R.jobString: Building Carl Gustav fm/42 Recoiless anti-tank Rifle.
LanguageData.Build_CGR.label: Build Carl Gustav Recoiless Rifle Mod.U
LanguageData.Build_CGR.description: Builds the Carl Gustav Recoiless Rifle Mod.U.\nCaliber: SPG-9 rocket/84mm CG/90mm shell/RPG rocket
LanguageData.Build_CGR.jobString: Building Carl Gustav Recoiless Rifle Mod.U.
LanguageData.BuildFLASH.label: Build M202 FLASH
LanguageData.BuildFLASH.description: Builds the M202 FLASH, a flamethrower replacement, can still use the common 66mm LAW rocket.\nCaliber: M72 LAW/66mm Rocket
LanguageData.BuildPzF.label: Build Panzerfaust 60
LanguageData.BuildPzF.description: Builds a Panzerfaust 60, something better than throwing explosive with your hands.\nCaliber: 149mm Panzerfaust Warhead
LanguageData.BuildRPzB.label: Build Raketenpanzerbüchse 54/1
LanguageData.BuildRPzB.description: Builds a Raketenpanzerbüchse 54/1, the trade off is, heavier and weaker, but it has more range and can be reloaded easily.\nCaliber: 88mm RPzB HEAT Rocket
